name: DaiCastle
description:
DaiCastle is a 2D top-down view battle royale game against 99 bots. The game is set on an island where players are dropped down, and fight to be the last alive. They have to get the best possible items, and eliminate others in the race of survival. Eventually, the size of the zone will be limited by a toxic storm that eliminates players. Can you be the last one alive, and win the game?

DaiCastle comes with an locker system with certain items that are unlocked if a certain tier is reached. To gain tiers, you have to gain levels, or complete quests. 20 exciting quest ideas were introduced that give a tonne of XP to make leveling up easier.

You can save your games with a replay system, and watch them back later, or share those moments with friends.

Requirements: Windows (x86 or better)
